API Walkthrough¶

Getting started with AutomatedFunctionGUI is easy. The main class you need to care about is auto_build_tabs

auto_build_tabs¶

auto_build_tabs.build_dynamic_callbacks(module_paths, argparse_parser='parser', argparse_help_commands=['--help', '-h'])[source]¶

function to create many dynamic callback functions linked to each element explicitly

Parameters

  • module_paths – a list of the paths to each function to visualize

  • argparse_parser – the name of the variable of the Argparse.parser object in the scripts

  • argparse_help_commands – the helper command line arguments to exclude when visualizing the command line arguments

auto_build_tabs.build_tab_per_function(module_paths, argparse_parser='parser', argparse_help_commands=['--help', '-h'])[source]¶

function to create a list of dcc.Tabs where each tab contains input elements for each function parameter

Parameters

  • module_paths – a list of the paths to each function to visualize

  • argparse_parser – the name of the variable of the Argparse.parser object in the scripts

  • argparse_help_commands – the helper command line arguments to exclude when visualizing the command line arguments

auto_build_tabs.dash_tab_for_cmd_args(function_parameters)[source]¶

This method will iterate through a function command line arguments and return a tab layout for the function

Parameters

function_parameters – a dict of dicts, the funciton name : [{ argument: Argparse._StoreAction }]

auto_build_tabs.get_argparse_parameters(script, argparser_parser='parser', file_handle='.py', argparse_help_commands=['--help', '-h'])[source]¶

this function will import a function with an Argparse.parser object and return a dicitonary of its command line arguments and their data types

Parameters

  • script – the script denoted as a submodule (ex: module.submodule)

  • argparser_parser – the variable name in which the Argparse.parser object is stored (default: ‘parser’)

  • file_handle – this cleans the script name in case the file hand in included by accident (default: ‘.py’)

Argparse_help_commands

this is a list of ineligible command line arguments to consider in the output

auto_build_tabs.param_to_dash_elem(argparse_store_action, param_name)[source]¶

This method converts an Argparse.parser._StoreAction object into an appropriate input field. A integer,string parameter will use a empty field. A parameter with specific choices to choose from will use a dcc.dropdown field. A parameter with many entries is still unclear how to handle. All parameters with default values will have that value prepopulated in the input field.
